> options(digits.secs = 3)
> data(sample_matrix)
> sample.xts = xts(sample_matrix, Sys.time() + seq(0, by = 0.1, length = 180))
> head(sample.xts)
                            Open     High      Low    Close

2012-03-20 08:49:02.920 50.23050 50.42188 50.23050 50.39767
